message.body: Well, I just made it through the interview. It was challenging but good, I think.

Yes and no. In hindsight some of the questions were so obvious but I had to talk on the fly because I hadn't really thought about it. But, I feel like I held my ground and did not look foolish. :D thanks again for your help!!! I would have been totally unprepared if it weren't for your guidance!!!
I bet you did great! Did they say when they will let you know?

They said they will finish interviews tomorrow and will be in touch in a few weeks. They made it very clear that it will take time on their end to organize the campus visit and asked that I be patient. I guess that's a good sign? Like don't take another offer until you hear from us?
The people were sooooo nice. I wanted to beg them for the job but I refrained.
They probably have to hire by June.
But I bet it goes by faster
Man, I hope so. Hey, I've been wanting to ask you about your swim routine and see if I can tag along sometime. If the Y lets non members visit.
Well keep me posted! I get to bring a guest three times a month! Texhnically no pool for guests I can't imagine how they would know
We should try it and play dumb if we get caught! Also SAUNA
Awesome!!! Let me know when you plan to go next. I'd LOVE to swim and sauna sometime maybe even once a month with you!!!
YES! Maybe next week? Post work swim sauna?
I'm about to get my taxes done by a professional.
You are way ahead of me. And good for you for not DIYing it!! Next week would be great. I'm open any night.
